channel.title: Slight Delay From Voting Once Day starts
channel.description:
Their should be >5 Second window before people can vote once a day starts so certain classes, (mainly invoker, noble, and reaper) can use their abilities that were made to prevent these sort of things. instead of instantly getting voted up as soon as day starts.
Opinions?

item.title: Slight Delay From Voting Once Day starts
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
That would be funny voting up reaper but not being able to vote him

Read full topic
item.source: Slight Delay From Voting Once Day starts

item.title: Slight Delay From Voting Once Day starts
item.dc:creator: UncannyLuck
item.description:
Funny enough - if it’s just you and the reaper and you’re chilled as you finger the reaper then it’ll put him up but you won’t be able to vote him up.

Ideally that shouldn’t be able to happen though.

Read full topic
item.source: Slight Delay From Voting Once Day starts
